Header.title: CHILLI CHANNEL
Header.paragraph: Here you will find verified information on how to restore your health.

About.paragraph: We are adequately approaching the issue of organic products. First of all, we test products on ourselves, so we can confidently call ourselves organic. We prepare products for ourselves, so it has an appropriate price list. In fact, organic is something that has not been subjected to any chemical treatment at all.

Services.name: Delivery in Thailand
Services.text: We provide a shipment to any place in Thailand.

Services.name: Referral program
Services.text: Our customers will have a 5% bonus on the next purchase for the reffered friends

Services.name: Special Order
Services.text: Our customer can specify in detail all the nuances
